item.title: Version 2.0 (Major new features and UI improvements)
item.description:
Version 2.0 (Major new features and UI improvements)

Greatly enhanced User Interface:
  • Show table now indicates when show is available to watch
  • Added graphics for TiVo status
  • Displays when shows have been deleted on TiVo
  • Additional columns of information (many hidden by default to keep simple)
  • User selection and ordering of columns
  • Advanced preferences via Option key
  • Documentation now available online
  • Help command within cTiVo
  • Many other changes
Metadata support:
  • Captioning (ccextractor)
  • Including metadata in video files (AtomicParsley)
  • pyTivo compatibility
  • Automatically adjusts caption timing when removing commercials
Other new features:
  • Optional inclusion of TiVo Suggestions in displays and subscriptions
  • Audio-only download
  • Elgato turbo.264 encoder support
  • Spotlight tracking of downloaded shows (keyword = cTiVoDownload)
Bug fixes:
  • Full 10.7 compatibility
  • Single quotes in file names
  • Format editing now affects existing subscriptions/downloads
  • Format editing fixes
  • Improved commercial removal with comskip
  • Improved speed for decrypting only downloads
  • Many others

Version 1.3.2
  • Added support for comSkip (experimental feature to remove commercials during encoding)
  • Improved scheduling function for daily operation
  • Added pause function for queue processing
  • Greatly improved logging functions with user control of detail level
  • Made Series Column behave same as Program column (for those who prefer Series/Episodes as two columns)
  • Allow user to reschedule shows in progress for greater flexibility in the queue
  • Improved drag/drop functionality so the user can reprioritize show processing with drag/drop
  • Queue restoration on restart should now keep original order
  • Shows deleted on Tivo are marked as such
  • Optional confirmation on quit during downloads, including quit after download completes
See cTiVo Home for more informaton.
